__TOC__

The London Chapter of the <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam|Ubuntu Canada Team]]</nowiki> is another dedicated team who promote Ubuntu in South Western Ontario.

=== How to Join ===

The easiest way is to come out to one of our <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-ca|Ubuntu Canada events]]</nowiki> in London. These are held in tandem with LOLUG monthly meetings, so check the calendar on our website.

You can join the group on Lauchpad here: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ca-london|https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ca-london]]</nowiki>

Registration on https://lolug.ca is open, and new members are encouraged to register, and you can also join the LOLUG mailing list at https://lolug.ca/mailman/listinfo/lolug
You can also join us in IRC! We are located in #lolug on Freenode, and you can join in your own client, or use the web interface at https://lolug.ca/irc
=== Ubuntu Hours ===
Ubuntu Hours will be held during our monthly LUG meetings, so there is another reason to join LOLUG
